code: import{SET_PLAYER}from'../actions/playerActions';var INITIAL_STATE={name:'',assertions:0,score:0,total:0,gravatarEmail:''};var playerReducer=function playerReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:INITIAL_STATE;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_PLAYER:return action.payload;default:return state;}};export default playerReducer;
